Interface WeatherBroadcast

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteWBroadcast
public interface WeatherBroadcast
Represents a weather broadcasting service in the Observer pattern. The WeatherBroadcast interface allows followers to subscribe to or unsubscribe from weather updates, and notifies all subscribed followers when there is a new update.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    follow(Follower follower)
    Adds a follower to the list of subscribers for weather updates.
    void
    notifyFollowers(String update)
    Notifies all subscribed followers with a new update.
    void
    unfollow(Follower follower)
    Removes a follower from the list of subscribers, stopping them from receiving future updates.

  • Method Details

    • follow

      void follow(Follower follower)
      Adds a follower to the list of subscribers for weather updates.
      Parameters:
      follower - the follower that wants to receive updates

    • unfollow

      void unfollow(Follower follower)
      Removes a follower from the list of subscribers, stopping them from receiving future updates.
      Parameters:
      follower - the follower that no longer wants to receive updates

    • notifyFollowers

      void notifyFollowers(String update)
      Notifies all subscribed followers with a new update.
      Parameters:
      update - the weather update message to send to all followers
